Headline: # 65 Grand Temporary Reroute near Grand/Des Plaines
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted Eastbound via Grand, Halsted, Chicago, Orleans and Grand due to street blockage near Grand/Desplaines.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted Eastbound via Grand, Halsted, Chicago, Orleans and Grand due to street blockage near Grand/Desplaines.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute at 35th/Justine
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Ashland, Pershing, Halsted and 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Justine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Ashland, Pershing, Halsted and 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Justine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Trains bypassing Garfield Station
ShortDescription: Red Line Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield Southbound due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield Southbound due to police activity.

  • Northbound service will operate from 95th Red Line to 63rd Red Line
  • Southbound service will operate every other train will turn from south to north at 35th

Note: Bus shuttle service will continue to rune from 95th to 35th.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: No trains between 95th and Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 95th due to injured passenger.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 95th due to injured passenger.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and Roosevelt at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Roosevelt and 95th Red Line station to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
